column5: a fire broke out in Svay Ta Nan village
column12: ordered the firefighting force to send six fire engines
column13: and requested immediate cooperation from the Kandal provincial police for two more vehicles.------The fire was extinguished at 16.42 after 8 fire trucks were used. 15 houses were completely destroyed in the blaze. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/417779
